info.title: Environment sensor
info.description: A mock temperature and humidity sensor on Arduino

181A.name: Environmental Sensing Service
181A.summary: Service to read temperature and humidity

2A1F.name: Temperature
2A1F.summary: Read or write temperature in Degree Celsius

2A6F.name: Humidity
2A6F.summary: Read humidity in percentage. A value of 50 denotes 50% humidity
